NEW_CUSTOMER_ONBOARDING.description: This journey welcomes new TATA AIG customers, builds familiarity, and collects health and family data for personalized engagement.

events.title: Welcome Experience
events.message: Hi {{customerName}}! Welcome to the TATA AIG Family. I'm your personal health concierge, and I'll help you make the most of your policy and stay on top of your health goals.

events.title: Policy Coverage Viewed
events.message: Here's a summary of your Medicare Premier coverage — including annual check-ups, hospitalization benefits, and concierge assistance.

events.title: Familiarity Building
events.message: To personalize your care, could I ask a few quick questions about your health habits and family? It helps us tailor your check-ups and alerts. We never share your info — it's just to serve you better.

events.title: Health Profile Survey
events.message: Great! Let's quickly set up your health preferences.
questions: Do you have any ongoing medications or conditions?
Who usually takes care of medical appointments in your family?
Do your parents or spouse have regular check-ups elsewhere? (We can help track those too if you wish)
Which hospital or doctor do you usually prefer nearby?

events.title: Health Profile Completed
events.message: Thanks, {{customerName}}! Your health preferences have been saved. We'll use this info to tailor reminders and check-up suggestions.

events.title: Family Mapping Prompt
events.message: Hey {{customerName}}, since you mentioned your parents sometimes need tests, would you like me to send reminders or offers for them too? You can track their reports right here in your app.

events.title: Family Member Added
events.message: Wonderful! We'll keep their info secure and make health management easier for your entire family.

events.title: Extended Family Map Created
events.message: Your family health map has been created successfully. You can now view or manage reminders for all members in one place.

events.title: Journey Complete
events.message: Welcome journey completed. You're now all set to enjoy personalized health assistance and benefits under your Medicare Premier policy.
